magneticSensingTechnology.description: method by which magnetism is detected

quiescentOutput.description: output of the magnetic sensor when no magnet is present

outputVoltageLinearRange.description: output voltage range over which the magnetic flux density response is linear
outputVoltageLinearRange.comment: lower value of the range captured by min value and top value of the range captured by max value (V)

linearMagneticSensingRange.description: magnetic flux density range over which the output voltage is linear

sensitivity.description: this is the gain - amount of change in the output voltage for a change in the magnetic flux density

operatePoint.description: magnetic flux density threshold which causes the sensor output to turn on
operatePoint.comment: units of mT. Depending on the sensor's design, the operation point can cause the output to trip High or Low.

releasePoint.description: magnetic flux density threshold which causes the sensor output to turn off
releasePoint.comment: units of mT. Depending on the sensor's design, the release point can cause the output to trip High or Low.

outputPolarity.description: indicates whether the sensor output is active high or active low

hysteresis.description: delta between the operate point and the release point threshold
